issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1. Create an app & replace the app.js with the app.js for analytics test in feature test repo
2. Follow the instructions for rightscale from this wiki page: https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Analytics+Test+Plan
3. Build & run the app on BB device
4. Now generate nav, setting, timed, user events using the app
5. Check on right scale if you see them

Actual Result:
1. The nav, setting, timed, user events do not show up on right scale

NOTE : I can see the feature event as expected

Expected result:
1. We should see these events
fields.summary: BlackBerry : We do not see analytic events like nav, setting, timed & user for BB
fields.environment:

comments.body: Closing this ticket as the issue will not fix.
